admixr 0.3.0

Reference

Running analyses

f3()

Calculate 3-population statistic.

d()

Calculate D statistic.

f4()

Calculate f4 statistic.

f4ratio()

Calculate f4-ratio statistic.

qpAdm()

Calculate admixture proportions in target populations using qpAdm.

Processing and filtering data

merge_labels()

Merge multiple samples/populations under a single label.

snps_missing()

Calculate the number/proportion of missing sites in each sample.

snps_present()

Calculate the number/proportion of covered sites in each sample.

subset_sites()

Generate new EIGENSTRAT dataset overlapping a given BED file.

Reading EIGENSTRAT data

read_eigenstrat()

Read a tripplet of EIGENSTRAT (geno/snp/ind files) files.

read_geno()

Read an EIGENSTRAT 'geno' file.

read_ind()

Read an EIGENSTRAT 'ind' file.

read_snp()

Read an EIGENSTRAT 'snp' file.

Writing EIGENSTRAT data

write_eigenstrat()

Write a triplet of EIGENSTRAT (geno/snp/ind files) files.

write_geno()

Write an EIGENSTRAT 'geno' file.

write_ind()

Write an EIGENSTRAT 'ind' file.

write_snp()

Write an EIGENSTRAT 'snp' file.

VCF-EIGENSTRAT conversion

vcf_to_eigenstrat()

Convert VCF file into three-file EIGENSTRAT format.

eigenstrat_to_vcf()

Convert EIGENSTRAT files into a VCF file.

Parsing ADMIXTOOLS log files

Useful only for processing old log files generated on the command-line without admixr.

read_output()

Read output file of one of the ADMIXTOOLS programs.

Contents

  • Processing and filtering data

  • VCF-EIGENSTRAT conversion
